title: The 4 commandments of cities
description: Eduardo Paes is the mayor of Rio de Janeiro, a sprawling, complicated, beautiful city of 6.5 million. He shares four big ideas about leading Rio -- and all cities -- into the future, including bold (and do-able) infrastructure upgrades and how to make a city "smarter."
author: Eduardo Paes
keywords: TED, talks, Brazil, TED Prize, cities, technology, urban planning, infrastructure, South America
